name: Chicken Duel Rush
description:
Chicken Dual Rush

As the tasty fried chicken becomes popular every day, chickens in the farm don't want to die so soon, so, they decided to do a tournament 1 vs 1 chicken vs chicken stand, the fastest chicken wins, the loser is sent to the frying pan.

Be the fastest chicken and beat over 10 waves of opponents in a best-of-3 match single player mode, or challenge a friend on a best-of-5 match local multiplayer and show him who is the fastest chicken in the farm!

****************************************************
Still in developement!
****************************************************

Controls:

Player 1 plays with Q, A or Left Shift Key
Player 2 plays with P, L or Right Shift Key

Left Click on the mouse for single player mode

Troubleshoot controls:

Try clicking outside and inside the canvas, change tabs and return to the game. If that fails, use firefox or internet explorer

How to play:

- Shoot your opponent when the "Fire!" signal is shown.
- The fastest player wins the round.
- The player shooting before the signal, loses the round.
- Beat your opponent in 2 out of 3 rounds in single player or 3 out of 5 rounds in local multiplayer mode.
